meanings.definition: To touch with the lips as a sign of love, greeting, or respect.
meanings.sent1: She kissed her grandma on the cheek.
meanings.sent2: The couple kissed under the moonlight.
meanings.sent3: The puppy kissed the kitten on the nose playfully.
meanings.sent4: The sun kissed the horizon goodnight.
meanings.sent5: His words kissed her heart with warmth.

meanings.sent1: He kissed the flower petals with care.
meanings.sent2: The breeze kissed her skin softly.
meanings.sent3: The paintbrush kissed the canvas delicately.
meanings.sent4: The rain kissed the earth, bringing life.
meanings.sent5: The butterfly kissed the flower as it landed.
